thread.title: Cara Lupinski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Cara Lupinski

author: Cara Lupinski
title: Cara Lupinski
text: The salesman we had was very friendly and not pushy at all. He gave us his honest opinion and was very helpful. Delivery was scheduled when we wanted it. Call ahead was right on time and the drivers were fast friendly and professional.
